Dwarven Monk

Dwarven Monks are martial artists found in the City level of the dungeon. They are fanatics who have devoted themselves to protecting their city's secrets from all aliens. They don't use any armor or weapons, relying solely on the art of hand-to-hand combat.

Description

These monks are fanatics, who devoted themselves to protecting their city's secrets from all aliens. They don't use any armor or weapons, relying solely on the art of hand-to-hand combat.

Item Class

* Java Class: Monk.java * Sprite Definition: Monk.json

Stats

* HP: 70 * Defense Skill: 30 * Attack Skill: 30 * Damage: 12-16 * Damage Resistance: 2 * EXP for Kill: 11 * Max Level: 21 * Attack Delay: 0.5

Special Abilities

* Disarm: On a successful hit, has a 16.7% (1/6) chance to disarm the target, knocking their weapon from their hands (if not wearing knuckles and the weapon isn't cursed) * Kick Attack: Uses a special kick animation for 50% of attacks * Immunities: Immune to Amok and Terror status effects * Drops: Food items with a 15.3% chance (from Treasury.Category.FOOD)

Habitat

Dwarven Monks can be found in the City level (levels 16-19) of the dungeon.

Behavior

* Dwarven Monks perform kick attacks for 50% of their attacks, using a special animation * They are immune to fear-based status effects like Amok and Terror * When disarming a target, the disarmed weapon is dropped on the floor if possible * When killed, they can trigger the Imp's quest in the city level

Strategy

* Because of their high defense skill and damage resistance, they can be challenging to defeat with low-tier weapons * The disarm ability can be dangerous if you're relying on a specific weapon * Their immunity to fear effects means fear-based tactics won't work against them * Consider using ranged weapons or magic to avoid the disarm effect

Lore

In the dwarf city, these monks are dedicated to protecting the secrets of their civilization. They have forsaken armor and weapons, instead mastering the art of unarmed combat to defend their territory against any intruders.
